page.title: 13Brownies and Guides
page.content: {Girls}can join the{Brownies}at 7 and become{Guides}at 10.Brownies wear a brown tunic and yellow necktie with a bobble hat.Guides have a blue uniform. They meet separately once a week. Brownies are split into groups called{sixes}each with its own name like Sprites, Gnomes, Elves, Pixies. Guide groups, called{patrols,}are led by patrol leaders and are called after wild birds like Robin,Thrush,Swallow. At our meetings we play{games,}work for{badges,}put on{concerts,}learn more about{guides in other countries and how they live and try to find ways of{helping out}in our own local community. Here is one of our{songs: } We're Brownie Guides, We're Brownie Guides, We're here to lend a hand;To love our God and serve our Queen, And help in home and land.
